dialogue.phrase: There is someone at the door for you, dear...
Ugh, I don’t have time right now. Tell them I am not home.
It’s one of the Onions, dear. I don’t think I can.
Dimitri! We must speak with you. It’s very urgent!
We are running out of time!
We are almost out of resources and we need your help.
Only you have knowledge of otter space. That’s why we need you to venture into otter space.
I can’t. I have a son, daughter and loving wife here on earth.
They will starve if no one brings them wood and water.
Fine! I’ll go, I guess I have no otter choice.
No, it’s a giant space ball.
Can we still collect the resources?
